treatment-md.title: Prosorhynchus platycephali (Yamaguti, 1934) Srivastava 1938
treatment-md.article-title: Bucephalids (Digenea: Bucephalidae) from marine fishes off the south-western coast of Java, Indonesia, including the description of two new species of Rhipidocotyle and comments on the marine fish digenean fauna of Indonesia
